title: Ticket #5435: file transfer plugins V2
description:
There are many shortcomings with file transfer plugins as implemented. Some of them are mentioned in the parent ticket #241. Here is a fuller, prioritized list of problems to be solved / features desired for the next iteration:

  1. Ability to keep stdout/err info from plugin to aid in plugin development and troubleshooting.

  2. Ability to remap file names, both on transfer of input and output.

  3. Ability to define a plugin at the submit point (or as part of the job), instead of requiring configuration at the execute node.

  4. Ability to monitor progress of transfers still in flight.

  5. Ability to transfer files in bulk instead of serially one at a time.

  6. Have retry logic be implemented in HTCondor itself instead of inside each file transfer plugin
